text: Ami apanara purbe ye samasta rasula o nabi prerana karechi, tara yakhana'i kichu kalpana kareche, takhana'i sayatana tadera kalpanaya kichu misrana kare diyeche. Atahpara allaha dura kare dena sayatana ya misrana kare. Erapara allaha tamra ayatasamuhake su-pratisthita karena ebam allaha jnanamaya, prajnamaya.
